mapper.insert: insert into userOrder(oId, oDate, mId, pId, quantity, price, statusCode) select OID_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, #{mId}, a.pId, a.cquantity, b.price * a.cquantity, 1 from userCart a, product b where a.pId = b.pId and a.mId = #{mId}
mapper.select: select a.oId, a.mId, a.pId, a.quantity, a.odate, a.price, a.statusCode, b.pName, c.statusName from userOrder a, product b, statusType c where a.mId = #{mId} and a.pid = b.pid and a.statusCode = c.statusCode order by oId desc
select count(*) from userOrder a where a.mId=#{mId}

select a.oId, a.mId, a.pId, a.quantity, a.odate, a.price, a.statusCode, b.pName, c.statusName from userOrder a, product b, statusType c where a.pid = b.pid and a.statusCode = c.statusCode and a.oId= #{oId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usercart(ucId, mId, pId, cquantity) VALUES(UCIDSEQ.nextval, #{mId}, #{pId}, #{cquantity})
mapper.select: select a.ucId, a.mId, a.pId, a.cquantity, b.pName, b.price, b.thumbnail from usercart a, product b where a.pId = b.pId and a.mId=#{mId}

select a.oId, a.mId, a.pId, a.quantity, a.odate, a.price, a.statusCode, b.pName, c.statusName from userOrder a, product b, statusType c where a.pid = b.pid and a.statusCode = c.statusCode order by oId desc

select a.oId, a.mId, a.pId, a.quantity, a.odate, a.price, a.statusCode, b.pName, c.statusName, d.mName, d.phone, d.address from userOrder a, product b, statusType c, member d where a.pid = b.pid and a.statusCode = c.statusCode and a.oId = #{oId} and a.mId = d.mId
select count(*) from userOrder a where oid>0
